original_text: Joseph bought a piece of linen cloth. He took Jesus' body down from the cross and he put the cloth around it. Then he put the body in a large hole in a rock. People had made that hole to put dead bodies in. After this, Joseph rolled a big stone across the front of the hole to shut it.
korean_text: 요셉이 세마포를 사서 예수를 내려다가 그것으로 싸서 바위 속에 판 무덤에 넣어 두고 돌을 굴려 무덤 문에 놓으매

sentences.original_text: Joseph bought a piece of linen cloth.
He took Jesus' body down from the cross
and he put the cloth around it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그 천을 시신에 둘렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then he put the body in a large hole in a rock.
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그는 시신을 바위의 큰 구멍에 넣었습니다.

sentences.original_text: People had made that hole to put dead bodies in.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 죽은 시신을 넣기 위해 그 구멍을 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: After this, Joseph rolled a big stone across the front of the hole
sentences.korean_translation: 이후에, 요셉은 구멍 앞에 큰 돌을 굴렸습니다.
